sentences.sContent: But ultimately only a small fraction carried multiple strains of rhinovirus.
sentences.sContent_eng: But ultimately only a small fraction carried multiple strains of rhinovirus.
sentences.sCn: 但其中只有一小部分最终携带多个鼻病毒株。

sentences.sContent: "The data showed us it wasn't H1N1 but instead was this rhinovirus infection," Coffin said.
sentences.sContent_eng: "The data showed us it wasn't H1N1 but instead was this rhinovirus infection," Coffin said.
sentences.sCn: 考芬说：“数据表明，这并非甲流病毒而是鼻病毒感染。”

sentences.sContent: Not only that, but rhinovirus--the germ that causes colds--can linger on surfaces in your home and in public.
sentences.sContent_eng: Not only that, but rhinovirus--the germ that causes colds--can linger on surfaces in your home and in public.
sentences.sCn: 不仅如此，鼻病毒——一种引发感冒的细菌——能够残留在你的家里或是公共场所。

trans.tranOther: any of various viruses that occur in the human respiratory tract and cause diseases, such as the common cold
